issue.title: Missing redertype "checkbox" for CSW searchfields in CATALOG
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

In v2, we can set CSW search fields rendered as: textbox,date and checkbox.
The checkbox type is missing in V4.

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.2

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Corrections made in 4.2.0 rc1 will solve this issue.

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

Hi Hélène,
I re-open this issue since I cannot find any fix in 4.2x or 4.3.x branch.
I suppose there should be an additional line in #__sdi_sys_rendertype_criteriatype and according code to create CSW filter.

Maybe not merged ? 

Thanks for your input on this!

**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

This functionnality was just not present in 4.2.0.
It's added to 4.3.2.
